name: Solitaire(cards)
description:
"Solitaire" is the definitive version of the card game play feel free!
This game is kind design that tells us where to be able to put the card shines!
I can move automatically with a single click you!
Solitaire is a card game playable easy for children.

How to play
If you clear all arranged side by side in order from A to mark the same frame of four of the top right !
Card in the center , ( 5 6 , red 7 , 8 of the black , red and black ...) which can be arranged in numerical order in red and black alternately
Card a series of overlap , is possible to move together .
You can put in column no cards and K ( King ) .
Card will receive new If you click on the deck of the upper left .
Card of the talon is also gone , I will fix turning again and again from the beginning.
